meta.reasoning: User reports table header is hidden/cut off when scrolling back up. Previous fixes attempted: (1) static positioning for page header - caused header to be stuck/inaccessible, (2) nested ScrollView changes. Root cause unclear - need to investigate why ScrollView is clipping the tableHeader at top. Hypothesis: The static VStack containing header/stats/filters may be consuming viewport space incorrectly, or the ScrollView's content offset isn't starting at 0.
